item.title: Enabling nested virtualization in KVM
item.author: Author
item.description: Nested virtualization allows you to run a virtual machine (VM) inside another VM while still using hardware acceleration from the host.

item.description: Procedures to assign static IP addresses for guest KVM

item.title: Home Lab - K8s on Centos 8 - VM host
item.author: Author
item.description: This home lab is going to build a CentOS 8 VM host on bare matel and 3 VM guest nodes be form up as a k8s cluster. The first step is going to craete the VM host on the bare metal.
